name: Parikshit G Galgali
title: Microservices Developer
objective:
Seeking an opportunity to leverage my professional
     experience and skills as a technical architect and willing to grow
     vertically in the Technology Vertical.
aboutme: Certified PMP®, PRINCE2® Foundation, ITIL® 2011 Foundation SCJP1.4® , SCWCD 5®. Experience in Investment Banking, Telecom domain, Manufacturing and Logistics, Retail.
skills:
Conversant with the SDLC TDD XP Agile and DevOPS
     practice project methodologies

Expertise in core Java development including
     collections, multi-threading & performance monitoring

Ability to partner with non-technical and technical
     peers; ability to work effectively with remote colleagues participate in technical discussions

projects.name: Lead To Order Generation Tool for Telecom Giant
projects.technologies: Kubernates , Spring Boot and Apache Camel
projects.description: Implemented and designed microservices based solution for telecom vendor using spring boot and Apache camel and utilized all the microservices ecosystems for the same.

projects.name: Facade for Channel Enablement
projects.technologies: REST Webservices and SOAP webservices with facade design pattern
projects.description: Implemented and designed SOA based solution for telecom vendor using Apache CXF

projects.name: Secure CMS for Banking Client
projects.technologies: REST Webservices(Spring based ws,Jersey).Docusign® API,Aspose® API,Mc Afee®API GSON
